intro: Psychotria nesophila, commonly known as the cloud forest psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the cloud forests of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found at high elevations. Due to its restricted habitat, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species within its native range.
